# clearpass_cert_trust_list (Resource)

Manages a Certificate Trust List in ClearPass.



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `cert_file` (String) The content of the certificate file.
- `cert_usage` (List of String) Usage of the certificate. Allowed values: `AD/LDAP Servers`, `Aruba Infrastructure`, `Aruba Services`, `Database`, `EAP`, `Endpoint Context Servers`, `RadSec`, `SAML`, `SMTP`, `EST`, `Others`.

### Optional

- `enabled` (Boolean) Whether the certificate trust list is enabled.

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) The ID of the certificate trust list.
